newsitem.title: USA: Thomas Group sees 2nd half below estimates.
newsitem.headline: Thomas Group sees 2nd half below estimates.

text.p: Thomas Group Inc said Tuesday that it expects second half sales and earnings to be below analysts' projections but above 1995 levels.
First Call consensus put the company's third quarter earnings at $0.33 per share and fourth quarter earnings at $0.37 per share.
First Call listed the company's year-ago figures as $0.25 per share in the third quarter and $0.33 per share in the fourth quarter.
The company said timing in the receipt of performance oriented fees, program starts and software sales affected third quarter earnings, but did not provide an estimate.
The company said it remains optimistic that its revenue will continue growing more than 20 percent annually.
The company said it will release third quarter results no later than November 7.
